{{disambig-more: '''Udûn''' was the deep valley in the northwest of [[Mordor]], formed at the meeting of the [[Ered Lithui]] and the [[Ephel Dúath]].  Its northern entrance was guarded by the [[Morannon]] and its southern entrance was guarded by the [[Carach Angren
The name ''Udûn'' is [[Sindarin]], meaning "dark pit, Underworld"<ref>{{HM
